caption.p: Cyclic voltammograms at different sweep rates of 3.2 mM ferrocene on a graphene electrode ( A â‰ˆ 0.3 cm 2) and a glassy carbon electrode ( A = 0.07 cm 2) in 12CE, Pt-mesh auxiliary electrode, E start = 0 V (graphene electrode) and 1 V (glassy carbon electrode), initial sweep direction positive. The currents on both axes have been normalized by the square root of the sweep rate.
